title: Accessible Gaming with Steven Spohn
description:
This week, we're joined by AbleGamers' chief development officer to talk about the complexity and importance of including accessibility features in games, and also, pizza. Really, lots and lots of pizza talk. We also discuss Far Cry 6 for a few minutes!

Other games discussed: Metroid Dread, Final Fantasy 14, Fortnite, Apex Legends, Satisfactory, Inscryption

AbleGamers: https://ablegamers.org/

Steven Spohn on Twitter: https://twitter.com/stevenspohn
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (Justin McElroy, Griffin McElroy, Russ Frushtick, Chris Plante)
